movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency inside Shawshank State Penitentiary.

comments.text: A timeless masterpiece, I rewatch it every single year.
The ending makes me cry happy tears. An incredible story of friendship.
Morgan Freeman is absolutely magnificent as Red.
This movie teaches you never to lose hope, even in the darkest cell.
The best Stephen King adaptation without a hint of horror.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical test when the Joker unleashes chaos on Gotham, forcing him to confront the thin line between heroism and vigilantism.

comments.text: Heath Ledger is the best Joker in cinematic history.
This isn't just a superhero movie, it's a powerful crime drama.
Hans Zimmer's score gives me goosebumps every time.
The Joker's philosophy of chaos is brilliantly written.
Nolan set the bar for comic book movies impossibly high.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully plant an idea into a target's subconscious.

comments.text: Did it fall or not?! The ending still haunts me.
The visual effects are mind-blowing for a 2010 film.
A complex plot that really makes your brain work.
DiCaprio is top-notch as always; Cobb's dramatic arc is very strong.
The concept of dreams within dreams is just insane.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a charismatic soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something far more dangerous and subversive.

comments.text: The first rule of Fight Club: you do not talk about Fight Club.
The twist at the end completely flipped my perception of the story.
Brad Pitt as Tyler Durden is the definition of charisma.
A film about how materialism destroys the individual.
Fincher's style is unmistakable—dark, gritty, and cool.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival as Earth becomes increasingly uninhabitable.

comments.text: Love is the one thing that transcends time and space.
I cried like a baby during the scene with the video messages from home.
The visualization of the black hole is simply breathtaking.
McConaughey gave the performance of his life in this movie.
The organ music creates a divine feeling in the vastness of space.
